con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="Environment" value="Default"/> <con:entry key="Global Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestSuite" value="Libreplan Suite de Test"/> <con:entry key="Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestRunner Path" value=""/> <con:entry key="Tool Args" value=""/> <con:entry key="Ignore Errors" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Host:Port" value=""/> <con:entry key="user-settings.xml Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="WSS Password Type" value=""/> <con:entry key="Save Project" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Enable UI" value="false"/> <con:entry key="System Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Domain" value=""/> <con:entry key="Coverage Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Export JUnit Results" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Export JUnit Results with test properties" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Open Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Project Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Export All" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Project Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="Report Format(s)" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestCase" value="Projet"/> <con:entry key="Print Report" value="true"/> <con:entry key="Username" value=""/> <con:entry key="Root Folder" value=""/> <con:entry key="Select Report Type" value=""/> <con:entry key="Save After" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Add Settings" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Endpoint" value=""/> </xml-fragment>

con:part.con:content: <application xmlns="http://research.sun.com/wadl/2006/10" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <grammars> <xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:ns1="http://rest.ws.libreplan.org"> <xs:import namespace="http://rest.ws.libreplan.org"/> <xs:element name="expense-sheet" type="expenseSheetDTO"/> <xs:element name="expense-sheet-line" type="expenseSheetLineDTO"/> <xs:element name="expense-sheet-list" type="expenseSheetListDTO"/> <xs:element name="update-delivering-date" type="updateDeliveringDateDTO"/> <xs:complexType name="updateDeliveringDateDTO"> <xs:sequence/> <xs:attribute name="customer-reference" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="external-code" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="external-company-nif" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="deliver-date" type="xs:anySimpleType"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="expenseSheetListDTO"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" ref="expense-sheet"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="expenseSheetDTO"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="ns1:integrationEntityDTO"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="expense-sheet-line-list"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" ref="expense-sheet-line"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="description" type="xs:string"/> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="expenseSheetLineDTO"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="ns1:integrationEntityDTO"> <xs:sequence/> <xs:attribute name="concept" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="value" type="xs:decimal"/> <xs:attribute name="resource" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="task" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="date" type="xs:anySimpleType"/> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> <xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://rest.ws.libreplan.org" xmlns:tns="http://rest.ws.libreplan.org"> <xs:element name="base-calendar" type="tns:baseCalendarDTO"/> <xs:element name="base-calendar-list" type="tns:baseCalendarListDTO"/> <xs:element name="calendar-exception-type" type="tns:calendarExceptionTypeDTO"/> <xs:element name="calendar-exception-type-list" type="tns:calendarExceptionTypeListDTO"/> <xs:element name="cost-category" type="tns:costCategoryDTO"/> <xs:element name="cost-category-list" type="tns:costCategoryListDTO"/> <xs:element name="criterion-requirement" type="tns:criterionRequirementDTO"/> <xs:element name="criterion-type" type="tns:criterionTypeDTO"/> <xs:element name="criterion-type-list" type="tns:criterionTypeListDTO"/> <xs:element name="direct-criterion-requirement" type="tns:directCriterionRequirementDTO"/> <xs:element name="indirect-criterion-requirement" type="tns:indirectCriterionRequirementDTO"/> <xs:element name="instance-constraint-violations-list" type="tns:instanceConstraintViolationsListDTO"/> <xs:element name="internal-error" type="tns:internalErrorDTO"/> <xs:element name="label" nillable="true" type="xs:anyType"/> <xs:element name="label-type" type="tns:labelTypeDTO"/> <xs:element name="label-type-list" type="tns:labelTypeListDTO"/> <xs:element name="machine" type="tns:machineDTO"/> <xs:element name="material-category" type="tns:materialCategoryDTO"/> <xs:element name="material-category-list" type="tns:materialCategoryListDTO"/> <xs:element name="order" type="tns:orderDTO"/> <xs:element name="order-element" type="tns:orderElementWithAdvanceMeasurementsOrEndDateDTO"/> <xs:element name="order-element-list" type="tns:orderElementWithAdvanceMeasurementsOrEndDateListDTO"/> <xs:element name="order-line" type="tns:orderLineDTO"/> <xs:element name="order-line-group" type="tns:orderLineGroupDTO"/> <xs:element name="order-list" type="tns:orderListDTO"/> <xs:element name="personal-timesheet-entry" type="tns:personalTimesheetEntryDTO"/> <xs:element name="personal-timesheet-entry-list" type="tns:personalTimesheetEntryListDTO"/> <xs:element name="resource-list" type="tns:resourceListDTO"/> <xs:element name="resource-worked-hours" type="tns:resourceWorkedHoursDTO"/> <xs:element name="resource-worked-hours-list" type="tns:resourceWorkedHoursListDTO"/> <xs:element name="subcontracted-task-data" type="tns:subcontractedTaskDataDTO"/> <xs:element name="task" type="tns:taskDTO"/> <xs:element name="task-list" type="tns:taskListDTO"/> <xs:element name="type-work-hours" type="tns:typeOfWorkHoursDTO"/> <xs:element name="type-work-hours-list" type="tns:typeOfWorkHoursListDTO"/> <xs:element name="unit-type" type="tns:unitTypeDTO"/> <xs:element name="unit-type-list" type="tns:unitTypeListDTO"/> <xs:element name="work-report" type="tns:workReportDTO"/> <xs:element name="work-report-line" type="tns:workReportLineDTO"/> <xs:element name="work-report-list" type="tns:workReportListDTO"/> <xs:element name="worker" type="tns:workerDTO"/> <xs:complexType name="resourceListDTO"> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0"> <xs:element ref="tns:worker"/> <xs:element ref="tns:machine"/> </xs:choice> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="workerDTO"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType abstract="true" name="resourceDTO"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:integrationEntityDTO"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="calendar" type="tns:resourceCalendarDTO"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="criterion-satisfaction-list"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="criterion-satisfaction" type="tns:criterionSatisfactionDTO"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="resources-cost-category-assignment-list"> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType abstract="true" name="integrationEntityDTO"> <xs:sequence/> <xs:attribute name="code" type="xs:string"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="resourceCalendarDTO"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:baseCalendarDTO"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="calendar-availability-list"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="calendar-availability" type="tns:calendarAvailabilityDTO"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:integrationEntityDTO"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="calendar-exception-list"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="calendar-exception" type="tns:calendarExceptionDTO"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="calendar-data-list"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="calendar-data" type="tns:calendarDataDTO"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="parent" type="xs:string"/> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="calendarAvailabilityDTO"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:integrationEntityDTO"> <xs:sequence/> <xs:attribute name="startDate" type="xs:dateTime"/> <xs:attribute name="endDate" type="xs:dateTime"/> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="calendarExceptionDTO"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:integrationEntityDTO"> <xs:sequence/> <xs:attribute name="date" type="xs:anySimpleType"/> <xs:attribute name="hours" type="xs:int"/> <xs:attribute name="calendar-exception-type-code" type="xs:string"/> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="calendarDataDTO"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:integrationEntityDTO"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="hours-per-day-list"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="hours-per-day" type="tns:hoursPerDayDTO"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="expiring-date" type="xs:anySimpleType"/> <xs:attribute name="parent-calendar" type="xs:string"/> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="hoursPerDayDTO"> <xs:sequence/> <xs:attribute name="day" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="hours" type="xs:int"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="criterionSatisfactionDTO"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:integrationEntityDTO"> <xs:sequence/> <xs:attribute name="criterion-type-name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="criterion-name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="start-date" type="xs:date"/> <xs:attribute name="end-date" type="xs:date"/> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="resourcesCostCategoryAssignmentDTO"> <xs:attribute name="end-date" type="xs:date"/> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="machineDTO"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:resourceDTO"> <xs:sequence/> <xs:attribute name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="description" type="xs:string"/> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType type="xs:string"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="advanceMeasurementDTO"> <xs:sequence/> <xs:attribute name="date" type="xs:anySimpleType"/> <xs:attribute name="value" type="xs:decimal"/> type="xs:anySimpleType"/> <xs:attribute name="saveDate" type="xs:anySimpleType"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="instanceConstraintViolationsListDTO"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="instance-constraint-violations" type="tns:instanceConstraintViolationsDTO"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="instanceConstraintViolationsDTO"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="constraint-violation" type="tns:constraintViolationDTO"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="recoverable-error" type="tns:recoverableErrorDTO"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" ref="tns:internal-error"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="instance-id" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="num-item" type="xs:long"/> <xs:attribute name="code" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="entity-type" type="xs:string"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="constraintViolationDTO"> <xs:sequence/> <xs:attribute name="field-name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="message" type="xs:string"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="recoverableErrorDTO"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="property" type="tns:propertyDTO"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="error-code" type="xs:int" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="message" type="xs:string"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="propertyDTO"> <xs:sequence/> <xs:attribute name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="value" type="xs:string"/> </xs:complexType> type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:attribute name="resource" type="tns:resourceEnumDTO"/> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="criterionDTO"> <xs:complexContent> name="orderLineGroupDTO"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:orderElementDTO"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="children"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice con:testSuite.name: Libreplan Suite de Test
con:testSuite.con:description: Suite de test sur le service web Libreplan : - Projet - Calendrier - Ressource

con:testCase.name: Projet
con:testCase.con:description: Suite de test par le webservice libreplan : - Création de projet - Récuperation des projets par le web service - Suppression de projet. - Vérification de la suppression du projet

con:restRequest.name: Ajouter des projets
con:restRequest.con:request: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <order-list xmlns="http://rest.ws.libreplan.org"> <order calendar-name="${Properties#calendarName2}" dependencies-constraints-have-priority="${Properties#dependencies2}" init-date="${Properties#initDate2}" name="${Properties#name2}" code="${Properties#code2}"> <labels/> <material-assignments/> <advance-measurements/> <criterion-requirements/> <children/> </order> <order calendar-name="${Properties#calendarName}" dependencies-constraints-have-priority="${Properties#dependencies}" init-date="${Properties#initDate}" name="${Properties#name}" code="${Properties#code}"> <labels/> <material-assignments/> <advance-measurements/> <criterion-requirements/> <children/> </order> </order-list>

con:assertion.name: Contient le code du nouveau projet
Contient le code du nouveau projet 2

con:testCase.name: Calendrier
con:testCase.con:description: Cas de test sur les fonctions calendrier : - Récupérer un calendrier - Récupérer tous les calendriers - Ajouter un calendrier

con:restRequest.con:request: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <base-calendar-list xmlns="http://rest.ws.libreplan.org"> <base-calendar name="${AddProperties#name}" code="${AddProperties#code1}"> <calendar-exception-list/> <calendar-data-list> <calendar-data code="${AddProperties#code2}"> <hours-per-day-list> <hours-per-day hours="8" day="MONDAY"/> <hours-per-day hours="8" day="TUESDAY"/> <hours-per-day hours="8" day="WEDNESDAY"/> <hours-per-day hours="8" day="THURSDAY"/> <hours-per-day hours="8" day="FRIDAY"/> <hours-per-day hours="0" day="SATURDAY"/> <hours-per-day hours="0" day="SUNDAY"/> </hours-per-day-list> </calendar-data> </calendar-data-list> </base-calendar> <base-calendar name="${AddProperties#name2}" code="${AddProperties#code3}"> <calendar-exception-list/> <calendar-data-list> <calendar-data code="${AddProperties#code4}"> <hours-per-day-list> <hours-per-day hours="8" day="MONDAY"/> <hours-per-day hours="8" day="TUESDAY"/> <hours-per-day hours="8" day="WEDNESDAY"/> <hours-per-day hours="8" day="THURSDAY"/> <hours-per-day hours="8" day="FRIDAY"/> <hours-per-day hours="0" day="SATURDAY"/> <hours-per-day hours="0" day="SUNDAY"/> </hours-per-day-list> </calendar-data> </calendar-data-list> </base-calendar> </base-calendar-list>

con:testCase.name: Ressource
